      • register

        public User register​(User user,
                     int verificationCode)
        This method registers a user. It always sets isAdmin to false during registration. By default, one admin will be created during application startup. Later that admin can promote other user to admin.
        Parameters:
        user - the User object
        Returns:
        created User object

      • banOrUnbanUser

        public User banOrUnbanUser​(User currentUser,
                           Long userId,
                           boolean isBanned)
        Checks if the current logged-in user is admin or not. Checks if the user with user id exists in database or not Sets the current ban information
        Parameters:
        currentUser - the current logged-in user
        userId - the user id whose profile will be banned or unbanned
        isBanned - the value true or false
        Returns:
        the user after updating the ban info
